website_summaries.verdict: Although this relaxer kit isn't ideal for everyone, it's worth a try for consumers who either need a product that's gentler to damaged hair, or prefer not to use harsh chemicals.
pros: An acceptable option for delicate, color treated, or damaged hair, as it is made with natural ingredients and doesn't contain lye, talc, parabens, silicone, or other harsh chemicals
Made with plant extracts that moisturize and condition
cons: Expensive, plus the portion sizes may not be enough to cover long hair
May not work on very coarse textures or extremely tight curls

customer_reviews.title: Plant based blessing
customer_reviews.text: Love this relaxer. First time trying it and I didnt smell any harsh chemical scents . I also didn't have any burning or tingling sensations from it like you would with toxic relaxers. Would definitely use again .
customer_reviews.author: Kei2Happiness

customer_reviews.title: I think relaxer was gentle and worked great for a plant base relaxer
customer_reviews.text: I think relaxer was gentle and worked great for a plant base relaxer. However, I was very disappointed in the quantity of product I recieved for such a high price. In other words.... too expensive and not enough product!! They need to put more relaxer in the box if their going to charge that much for a relaxer. Other than that I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie Reese

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't burn and gets hair straight.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only relaxer I use, others burn. My natural hair is probably 4a or 4b, I don't know, I haven't seen it in a while ; ). I use Index 1 and it comes out very straight. The only downside is the expense. I have a professional apply it and they don't discount for having your own relaxer, so I'm paying quite a bit each relaxer.
customer_reviews.author: DRT

customer_reviews.title: BEST TEXTURIZER EVER.
customer_reviews.text: Best texturizer ever. I've used Phyto Index I off and on for years to loosen the curl on my 4a/b/c type hair. It's fantastic. It loosens the curl just a little, never over-processes (i.e., never leaves me with random straight pieces of hair), leaves my hair soft and conditioned, and even though it's expensive, I find one box is enough for 4 applications. I've tried other texturizers you can get at the drugstore, and found them nowhere near the quality and consistency of this one. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work at all. It will literally have you thinking it does for just a few minutes. And then boom boom pow your hair is back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Yafai

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but good.
customer_reviews.text: Found this product to be gentle on my scalp and hair but provided a good relaxed look in only a few minutes of applying. I will definitely order this product again. Would have given a 5 star if it wasn’t so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: NDee

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled
customer_reviews.text: Product may have been old. Didn’t work as well on the past.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my hair
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product twice, once with the index 2, and a touch up with the index 1; the index2 broke my hair down faster than the 1, but I used the 1 because I have a lot of fine, thick hair. I will be using the 2 from now on, or until I decide to go natural again. There was no burn or the smells that you would get from the other relaxers. The #2 made my hair pleasingly straight. The only problem is that my hair is gray, and it picks up the chemical tints which causes the yellowing and I have to use a special shampoo to wash the yellow out.
customer_reviews.author: Nesscee1

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this product. I used it the day after it arrived. I have long very curly hair. This product barely took any curl out of my hair. As a matter of fact I think it is more frizzy now. It also dried it out. I really wished I wouldn't have wasted my $65.
customer_reviews.author: Sjhilton

customer_reviews.title: Best Hair Relaxer for thin hair
customer_reviews.text: I have very thin, and unruly curly hair. I have been relaxing my hair for 36 years. This relaxer has been the best I've ever tried so far. It protected my hair, and above anything my scalp. It delivers what it promises. I will never use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Nikitana

customer_reviews.title: Not handled well
customer_reviews.text: This is the second box I received and it looks like it went through the grinder not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta McClay

customer_reviews.title: All natural
customer_reviews.text: No chemicals, that's the best part about this product. I only wish I'd known about it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Rich

customer_reviews.title: Wow Plant Based Relaxer
customer_reviews.text: Straighten hair at least once a year, so it's perfect for that as that I have wavy hair. It's plant based so I feel a little bit more comfortable putting this type of relaxer in my hair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this relaxer
customer_reviews.text: Love this relaxer... My Beautian uses this and I was so happy to find it on Amazon... very easy to use and I thank God she told me what to get and how to use it...
customer_reviews.author: Latasha Ibidokun

customer_reviews.title: Margee48
customer_reviews.text: Not a great product & I don’t believe it’s organic.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phytospecific
customer_reviews.text: I'm African American and had natural hair (textures 4a, 4b and 4c combo...it was nuts) for over a decade. After much consideration and debating with my stylist about returning to relaxers, I told her I wanted to use the Phytospecific relaxer and she suggested Index 1 because my hair was virgin. Well, we gave it a go in September and it turned out beautifully. Nine weeks later... I've had a retouch with the Phyto and my hair is so healthy and full of body. I'm very happy that I've made the transition back to relaxers after a decade!!
customer_reviews.author: E C

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you are looking for a mild product ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product if you are looking for a mild product that will make natural hair more manageable. If you are looking for a straight processed perm result this would not be the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tobi Fields

customer_reviews.title: Happy client
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this product. My hair did not shed like it normally do after a touch up. No burning until it was time to rinse it out in one spot. I have a very very sensitive scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Better Run and Tell That

customer_reviews.title: All natural, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for my super curly hair! The results were even better than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: t_jet95FL

customer_reviews.title: phytorelaxer
customer_reviews.text: it has been 2 yrs since i had a perm....ive had perms but was unhappy with the salons and did not want to use chemicals any more...my hair is coarse dry with tight curls and wanted to only texturize...this was a big help....it was easy and im happy with the results though i wish i left the relaxer on a bit longer
customer_reviews.author: peaches

customer_reviews.title: This is the best relaxer I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best relaxer I have ever used. I have wavy at the roots and straight near the ends and this relaxer blends it all together for a nice bouncy straight look. It has never burned my scalp and I use the delicate because I was wearing my hair natural and I wanted something mild that would straighten the wavy but not weigh me down and Phyto does it for me. I hate the price but since I only have to touch up my hair 2 to 3 times a year I'll deal with it. Relaxed in June 2014, touched up February 2015 and about to touch up July 2015...
customer_reviews.author: Ms Parker

customer_reviews.title: Still Better than Keratin
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for 10+ years. It's the best permanent treatment that is gentle enough not to cause breakage. Still prefer this over keratin treatments.
customer_reviews.author: AK_Vance

customer_reviews.title: Phyto Perm !
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 2+ years due to the no lye ingredient. Having fine hair and sensitive scalp this product was mild enough to restructure my hair for a natural look. Several months ago I purchased the product from a store and developed a rash behind the ear. After an inquiry from another user it was suggested that the product perhaps was stale on the shelf. I decided to give it another try ordering it from Amazon and the performance of the product is great!! I would use nothing else on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Frog

customer_reviews.title: I have fine thin hair
customer_reviews.text: No burning or scalp irritation. I have fine thin hair. I brought this product thinking it was the safest product I could find. I do see my hair breaking somewhat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good relaxer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brand of relaxer. It's a little expensive, but because I have short hair, I can use it at least two times, if not three. It doesn't over process my hair, and I'm really happy with the results from it. It actually as helped me to get healthier hair because it has more natural ingredients. :)
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, Strong and Soft Hair
customer_reviews.text: Only hair relaxer that does not over straighten my hair and leaves hair healthy without breakage.
customer_reviews.author: Koanji Hong Kong

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE FOR RESTORED HEALTHY LOOKING HAIR
customer_reviews.text: tHIS PRODUCT HAS HELPED TO RESTORE MY HAIR FROM A LOT OF HARSH RELAXERS IN THE PAST.
customer_reviews.author: charmione Thomas

customer_reviews.title: cheaper and do a better job for my hair
customer_reviews.text: Product is okay, but I prefer linage products, cheaper and do a better job for my hair
customer_reviews.author: Evel Jackson

customer_reviews.title: PhytoSpecific Phytorelaxer Index 1
customer_reviews.text: PhytoSpecific Phytorelaxer Index 1 this relaxer is very good and does not burn your scalp, my hair looks healthy nice
customer_reviews.author: ella

customer_reviews.title: is that my hair easily shrink as before I start using this
customer_reviews.text: Okay I ordered this product only to loosen my tight curly afro hair and it works. The only problem I still have, is that my hair easily shrink as before I start using this. I guess that's just how my hair is. I had it done professionally at the Dominican salon, it didn't burn and it sat on my hair for a good 45 mins before rinse. I maintained my hair my doing weekly protein and moisture treatment, for style, wash n go and mostly twist out.
customer_reviews.author: Prosper For Ever

customer_reviews.title: My hair have been restored !
customer_reviews.text: This product is what I was looking for..not harsh chemicals it works great ! Love the feeling of my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: This product was great!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is super curly (Indian and African American) and in the summer with the humidity I never have a good hair day! I did not want bone straight hair just to lessen the curl and make my hair more manageable. This did the trick. I followed the directions exactly and watched a utube video on straightening before I did it myself. I will use this product again for sure! Rinsing out the straightener was a pain, but reading the reviews prepared me! Finally, I love my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Lbmama

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money -- I could have gotten Mizanni or one of those relaxers -- this one was horrible
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This relaxer is very gentle and delicate. It does not get my hair bone straight, but it is effective in relaxing the natural curl enough to make my hair more manageable without the harshness of other box perms!
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: This is the best relaxer that I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I would recommend this product to anyone. The texture of my hair is better and I won't go back to any other relaxer. Yes, it's a bit pricey, but it's worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: 850sharie77

customer_reviews.title: Phytospecific is the only one for curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: Phytospecific Index 1 is the only relaxer on the market that does not damage my extra fine hair. It leaves it straight but with plenty of body. And the bonus is, I only have to straighten my hair after about 10 weeks which saves me money. Speaking of saving money, you can get two straigtenings in one box! I also have found that the directions are easy to understand and follow. An excellent product when you cant afford to go into a Phyto Salon.
customer_reviews.author: B. P. Crues

customer_reviews.title: I love this product.
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I used this product. I was hesitant initially. I have fine hair with natural waves. This product enhanced my natural wave pattern and my hair remain soft after the treatment. I will never put any other relaxer on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: 5 star kit
customer_reviews.text: I have written before and by far the best organic relaxer on the market I will defiantly purchase again..!!! Luv luv
customer_reviews.author: rain27

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I used it for the first time and I really found that it was delicate to my hair. Less breakage after application and hair feels good. I will try it again
customer_reviews.author: Latreece Blacks

customer_reviews.title: Best relaxer used suring the last 40 years!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have be getting my hair relaxed for the last 40+ years. Although, I normally don't write review or blog; I felt that I must provide a review for this incredible relaxer. I have fine, fagile hair; and have tried just about every relaxer made. NONE can hold a candle to the phytospecific. My hair retained its' strenght, was straight, shinny and had body. My hair was left in a healthy state. I can't stop touching my hair because it is so beautiful. The relaxer is a bit pricee, but well worth it. It is a relaxer taken to a whole new level.
customer_reviews.author: rkamson

customer_reviews.title: I love this Relaxer!!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to order Phytorelaxer Index I (Kit) last week after a couple of weeks of research. I received the kit today and just completed relaxing my hair. My hair is bone straight and the sheen is unbelievable. I must add that I was a little worried that I would not be able get the desired results because of the lenghty steps mentioned in several reviews. Please don't let it intimidate you! The process is very simple and I will certainly be a long time customer of Phytospecific.
customer_reviews.author: N. Keith

customer_reviews.title: The Best!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best perm ever. I wish i started using it a long time ago. I will recommend it to my friends :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Jean Pierre

customer_reviews.title: GREAT RELAXER
customer_reviews.text: SECOND TIME USING THIS RELAXER INDEX 1... I PURCHASE PRODUCT AND HAVE MY HAIR STYLIST APPLY MY RELAXER...MY HAIR IS BONE STRAIGHT BOTH TIMES NO HAIR LOST LOTS OF BODY AND BOUNCE...LIL DRYING AFTER RELAXING...I TRIED SHAMPOO AND HAIR MASK DIDNT LIKE NEITHER PRODUCT. I WILL CONTINUE TO USE PHYTORELAXER LIKE THE WAY MY HAIR HAVE LIFE AFTER APPLYING ALTHOUGH PRODUCT IS VERY EXPENSIVE
customer_reviews.author: ALICIA ADAMS

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING !!
customer_reviews.text: This product is superb ! Very gentle yet effective in straightening my new growth which is 4b, I would recommend index 1 for anybody contemplating 2 because index 1 definitely straightens but still leaves some curl integrity without your hair stuck to your scalp and once the hair is straighten with flat iron or blow dry it looks even better and has lots of fullness ! No more limp relaxed hair !!
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Price for an Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the same product that you get from Sephora and other dealers. I love this relaxer and have been using it for about 5 years now. My hair has never been healthier or longer. I was in disbelief when I ordered this product for the price, but it's the exact same $60 kit from other retailers. I will ALWAYS buy my products from them from now on.
customer_reviews.author: T. Arigunawan

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product. I used it while 7 months pregnant, and two months later my hair is still nice and smooth. I used Index 1, and it did very well for my fine and thin hair. Will recommend to anyone with stress out hair.
customer_reviews.author: Naturaleza5

customer_reviews.title: Best product in the world!
customer_reviews.text: This perm left my hair soft and silky , no burns, no smells, my hair did not stick to my head.. I will never use any other perm but this one.
customer_reviews.author: Blasian

customer_reviews.title: Best Product
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft it makes my hair and it I can go extended periods without a touch up. Great products by Phyto.
customer_reviews.author: Suiteleo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something gentler, and I was dissatisfied. It was very strong and made my hair thinner than it was before.
customer_reviews.author: schebania pinchinat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have not used any other relaxer since using Phyto Specific. This relaxer is expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Trudie Quinn

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: That's what I did when I received my shipment .. no comment
customer_reviews.author: Amer

customer_reviews.title: Over-priced item. But it arrived in time for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Over-priced item. But it arrived in time for my use. I may look for a less expensive product for my hair with the same ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Pammy

customer_reviews.title: Product Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time Ive ordered this product from amazon. Both times I received the product in a sealed package. However, once opened the contents appeared to have burst at some point. I believe it must have been stored for quite awhile in an environment that is not temperature controlled. After this happened the first time, I decided to try again. Too much of a hassle to return. After tho repeated experience I will never order this product again through amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product did not burn my scalp. It was gently on the scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Lillies

customer_reviews.title: phyto 1 and 2 comments
customer_reviews.text: yes i willhighly recommand this products to anyone that like to leave the texter in their hair,,This product is not for everyone..Phyto 2 is for that person that like to leave their hair really straight.
customer_reviews.author: nettie muir

customer_reviews.title: It also feels/looks really nice with blow dry
customer_reviews.text: My hair grew healthier with this product! It also feels/looks really nice with blow dry.
customer_reviews.author: Camila

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have given myself relaxers for over 20 years so I know what I'm doing. This product did not take at all. I was careful to follow the instructions, but still it did not work. Sadly, I thought that PhytoSpecific might be a superior product because of the price. I will go back to using my $9 product that has worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: SailorGirl86

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 2 years and works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Doria Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very mild relaxer that won't burn
customer_reviews.text: Kind of pricey; however, you get two or three applications out of this relaxer. Very gentle, doesn't smell as I was able to apply this relaxer several times without using gloves (something I would not risk with other brands). Good product if you want to fight dry hair and you have been through too many relaxers that break off your hair.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love this perm...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of perms.. this one doesn't damage my hair if its done correctly. Its for thinner hair women.. I've tried Index Kit 2 that broke my hair.. Make sure you know the texture of your hair before choosing. Live and learn..
customer_reviews.author: Chole Charles

customer_reviews.title: Index one better than any other salon relaxer
customer_reviews.text: I have applied Index one , Phytorelaxer to virgin hair and have no breakage , har is not dried out and no shedding. Had I rried this relaxer before now , I would have not been a naturalistah for the previous past 3 years , I grew tired of being a natural kemetic kinky har lady , so I know of this relaxer and this company Phyto for over 6 years, it is Safe , Effective and you can achieve longer , prettier har without the volume of your natural dew.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd time buying this product but my first time from this supplier. I just opened the box tonight and discovered it was hard as a rock. Yes I know I should have openedthe box when it arrived but because the box was sealed prefectly I thought it would be ok. I was wrong, so no I won't buying from this supplier again, maybe not even buying this product again. I will have to think long and hard before I do, because of the price and the fact that I can go to the salon and get it done for less.
customer_reviews.author: RMH

customer_reviews.title: ispotbeauty is not a good supplier for phytospecific
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. This suppliers product is out dated. I've bought and applied this product the past year. This application did not relax my hair at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Product was compromised!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2. Opened one of the containers and the product felt like there were hundreds of tiny pieces of glass mixed in. May have expired or wasn't properly stored. Probably reason for deep discount. Didn't notice it until I was halfway thru hair. Have used product for years and this is the first time I've experienced this. Lost most of my hair in the process. Will be dumping the other box. Probably time to go au naturel.
customer_reviews.author: VeeH

customer_reviews.title: Do not use
customer_reviews.text: My hair was doing well until I used this product. I did nothing different but use this. My hair started to break shortly after. I am very disappointed and angry. This is supposedly gentle but ruined my hair, whereas the cheaper products did not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The product performs in the way it is marketed. Good detailed instructions. Make sure you read through the instructions before starting as there are various time restrictions that should be adhered to.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When i ordered this the image represented the product i wanted and It is not what i received. What i received was The box is brown and white box. I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Sandra D.

product_meta.title: PHYTO SPECIFIC Relaxer Index 1 Botanical No-Lye Relaxer
product_meta.description:
A revolutionary, gentle, hydroxide-free relaxing treatment for delicate, fine hair. The only relaxer in the market with active relaxing ingredients of 100% natural origin. The egg and soy-based formula is odorless and does not contatin lye for ultimate scalp comfort. Relax delicate and fine hair safely and effectively without the use of harsh chemicals. PARABEN FREE | SILICONE FREE | PETROCHEMICALS FREE | TALC FREE

1
Since 1965, PHYTO is the story of two passions: hair and plants. Patrick Ales believes plants are the safest and most effective way to achieve healthy hair. We create hair that is full, strong with incredible body – beautiful!
